Title: Requires persons with housing vouchers be informed of their rights and provided with a bill of such rights
Summary: Requires persons with housing vouchers be informed of their rights and provided with a bill of such rights.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law and the executive law, in relation to requiring persons with housing vouchers be informed of their rights and provided with a bill of such rights
